name: flickr.groups.getInfo
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: group_id
arguments.description: The NSID of the group to fetch information for.

arguments.name: group_path_alias
arguments.description: The path alias of the group. One of this or the group_id param is required

arguments.name: lang
arguments.description:
The language of the group name and description to fetch.  If the language is not found, the primary language of the group will be returned.

Valid values are the same asin feeds.
